00016 void Material::Bump(Reference<Texture<float> > d,
00017                 const DifferentialGeometry &dgGeom,
00018                 const DifferentialGeometry &dgs,
00019                 DifferentialGeometry *dgBump) {
00020         // Compute offset positions and evaluate displacement texture
00021         DifferentialGeometry dgEval = dgs;
00022         // Shift _dgEval_ _du_ in the $u$ direction
00023         float du = .5f * (fabsf(dgs.dudx) + fabsf(dgs.dudy));
00024         if (du == 0.f) du = .01f;
00025         dgEval.p = dgs.p + du * dgs.dpdu;
00026         dgEval.u = dgs.u + du;
00027         dgEval.nn =
00028                 Normalize((Normal)Cross(dgs.dpdu, dgs.dpdv) +
00029                                  du * dgs.dndu);
00030         float uDisplace = d->Evaluate(dgEval);
00031         // Shift _dgEval_ _dv_ in the $v$ direction
00032         float dv = .5f * (fabsf(dgs.dvdx) + fabsf(dgs.dvdy));
00033         if (dv == 0.f) dv = .01f;
00034         dgEval.p = dgs.p + dv * dgs.dpdv;
00035         dgEval.u = dgs.u;
00036         dgEval.v = dgs.v + dv;
00037         dgEval.nn =
00038                 Normalize((Normal)Cross(dgs.dpdu, dgs.dpdv) +
00039                                  dv * dgs.dndv);
00040         float vDisplace = d->Evaluate(dgEval);
00041         float displace = d->Evaluate(dgs);
00042         // Compute bump-mapped differential geometry
00043         *dgBump = dgs;
00044         dgBump->dpdu = dgs.dpdu +
00045                 (uDisplace - displace) / du * Vector(dgs.nn) +
00046                 displace * Vector(dgs.dndu);
00047         dgBump->dpdv = dgs.dpdv +
00048                 (vDisplace - displace) / dv * Vector(dgs.nn) +
00049                 displace * Vector(dgs.dndv);
00050         dgBump->nn =
00051                 Normal(Normalize(Cross(dgBump->dpdu, dgBump->dpdv)));
00052         if (dgs.shape->reverseOrientation ^
00053                 dgs.shape->transformSwapsHandedness)
00054                 dgBump->nn *= -1.f;
00055         // Orient shading normal to match geometric normal
00056         if (Dot(dgGeom.nn, dgBump->nn) < 0.f)
00057                 dgBump->nn *= -1.f;
00058 }
